divs: sighting details9am, 12\06, my wife called me on the phone (i was out of town) and told me that she saw a ufo, previous night. this is unlike her, she is very serious and sober. wife was asleep when she awoke with a start. my wife described very brilliant, noiseless, light in sky east of our horse ranch that had no strobe, was not a star and yet hung in the sky. she initially thought it was a star, until it slowly began to move from north to south and then disappeared out of her line of sight. thinking it was a helicopter, she started to go to sleep, but turned back to look out the window again and was shocked to see that it was again (!) in thev ery same spot that it had just flown away from... now being curious, she watched it become dimmer and gradually vanish, apparently flying away, but not perceptibly moving. she called me the next day and mentioned this as an aside. i pooh poohed it until today. at our neighbor's x'mas dinner at their ranch adjoining ours, today, my neighbor told me that his ranch suffered a bizarre electromagnetic disturbance and that his wide-screen tv and several radio devices turned on spontaneously several weeks ago in the middle of the night waking him from a deep sleep. he mentioned that he was shocked and went outside to look at his electrical lines and then saw a strange light in the ne sky, directly over our ranch, passing slowly from north to south. he mentioned that after a few minutes the tv and other devices all turned off by themelves. after we put our heads together, we determined that it was 12\6\07, that very same night, at 4-4:30 am. and i have decided to make this report.
